sentence.Network_en: To cure halitosis, add litchi to congee and simmer.
sentence.Network_cn: 要治口臭症, 荔枝与粥炖.

sentence.Network_en: With what medicine remedial halitosis is good, and without side - effect?
sentence.Network_cn: 治疗口臭用什么药好, 且无副作用?

sentence.Network_en: Treatment of halitosis contains two aspects: mechanical treatment and chemical treatment.
sentence.Network_cn: 口源性口臭的治疗包括两方面机械性治疗和化学性治疗.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 简介口臭(halitosis)亦称口腔异味，是指口腔内的不良气味。它严重影响人们的社会交往和心理健康。
词源: halare(L.), to breathe 呼吸halitosis n. 口发出臭气, 口臭hal 2
口臭问题 (halitosis) 可能是因扁桃腺结石 (tonsilloliths) 引起，有耳鼻喉科专科医生称，食物残渣长期积聚口腔内可形成扁桃腺结石，有.

entry.def: If someone has halitosis, their breath smells unpleasant.
